attributes.action: Get Rid of ALL Mps and replace them with Policies
attributes.additional_details:
The Whole Government and Opposition should resign and we should replace the whole shambles with Votes for Policies Not Parties Nor Persons.
All Governments prove time and time again that they are the least qualified to do what the people want.
Let the people decide themselves what they want and let them monitor the civil servants to make them do what They Want.
I want ALL THE POLITICIANS TO RESIGN.
THEY ARE A TOTAL WASTE OF SPACE, TIME AND MONEY.
